articles.description: India play England in the Men's T20 World Cup semi-finals - follow text updates, video highlights and radio commentary.
articles.title: India vs England LIVE: ICC T20 World Cup 2024 semi-final - cricket score, commentary, video highlights & updates

articles.description: Britain’s Emma Raducanu, Katie Boulter and Harriet Dart are all beaten in the quarter-finals at Eastbourne.
articles.title: Eastbourne International: Britain’s Emma Raducanu, Katie Boulter & Harriet Dart beaten

articles.description: England defender Marc Guehi says "everyone is behind" manager Gareth Southgate before the Euro 2024 last-16 meeting with Slovakia on Sunday.
articles.title: Euro 2024: England's Marc Guehi says players support Gareth Southgate

articles.description: McLaren’s Lando Norris says he is searching for perfection in his quest to beat Red Bull’s Max Verstappen consistently in Formula 1.
articles.title: Austrian Grand Prix 2024: McLaren's Lando Norris searching for perfection in quest to beat Red Bull's Max Verstappen

articles.description: The Atlanta Hawks select teenage French forward Zaccharie Risacher with the first overall pick of the NBA draft.
articles.title: NBA Draft: Atlanta Hawks select French teen Zaccharie Risacher with first pick

articles.description: Steven Finn and Alex Hartley criticise the "awful" pitch used for the T20 World Cup semi-final between South Africa and Afghanistan in Trinidad.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Semi-final pitch was 'horrific', say TMS pundits

articles.description: A former prime minister of Georgia says he will give £8.4m to Willy Sagnol's players after their Euro 2024 win against Portugal.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Former Georgia prime minister pledges £8.4m to players after Portugal win

articles.description: Anthony Joshua has urged Tyson Fury to fight him while both boxers are still "fresh", but says he will not "sit around and wait" for his fellow British heavyweight.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua tells Tyson Fury he won't "sit around and wait" for long-awaited fight

articles.description: Dallas Cowboys quarterback Dak Prescott files an extortion lawsuit against his accuser as a sexual assault case is dismissed.
articles.title: Dak Prescott: Sexual assault case against Dallas Cowboys quarterback dismissed

articles.description: British schoolgirl Hannah Klugman misses out on reaching the main Wimbledon draw as she loses her final qualifying match.
articles.title: Wimbledon qualifying: GB's Hannah Klugman beaten by Alycia Parks
